BitmapLayerTreeOwner

　The BitmapLayerTreeOwner class is a class that holds a layer tree and allows you to obtain the drawing results with the Bitmap class. (1.1.0 or later)
By passing instead of window as the first argument of the constructor of the Layer class, you can get the drawing result of those Layers as an image as a Bitmap class.

メンバ

コンストラクタ
BitmapLayerTreeOwner
